questions.prompt: What would be a good title for this collection of memories? Provide only the title, no explanation.
Summarize what this cluster of memories is about in 2-3 sentences. Focus on the overarching theme or story.
List 3-5 recurring patterns or themes you notice across these memories. One pattern per line.
What are the key insights or lessons learned from these experiences? List 3-5 insights, one per line.
List any technical knowledge, configurations, procedures, or facts that should be documented. One item per line. If none, respond with 'None'.
List important relationships between people, projects, or concepts mentioned. Format as 'X relates to Y'. One per line. If none, respond with 'None'.
Does this cluster contain knowledge worth extracting into a structured document? Answer only 'yes' or 'no'.
If this were to become a knowledge document, what type would it be? Examples: technical guide, project history, troubleshooting guide, relationship map, lessons learned. Provide only the type.
